meanings.definition: Quiet, gentle, and easily imposed on; submissive.
meanings.sent1: The meek kitten never hissed or scratched.
meanings.sent2: She spoke in a meek voice, barely audible in the noisy room.
meanings.sent3: The meek puppy wagged its tail even when scolded for chewing shoes.
meanings.sent4: His meek demeanor made him an easy target for bullies.
meanings.sent5: The meek breeze whispered through the trees, hardly noticed by anyone.

meanings.sent1: The meek student waited quietly for his turn to speak.
meanings.sent2: Her meek smile brightened the room with its warmth.
meanings.sent3: The meek apology was so sincere that it touched everyone's hearts.
meanings.sent4: The meek glow of the candle added a peaceful ambiance to the room.
meanings.sent5: His meek acceptance of criticism showed his true strength of character.
